<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 1: Collect Taxes](/Rules.aspx?ID=1801)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 538

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can [Collect Taxes](/Actions.aspx?ID=1410) once per Kingdom turn to attempt to bolster your Economy-based checks for the remainder of the Kingdom turn. If you don't attempt to Collect Taxes, you can instead attempt a DC 11 flat check; on a success, reduce Unrest by 1.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
